name: VVitching Hour: Cradle of Ash
description:
VVitching Hour is a game series following a coven of witches who cross the occult in an industrializing world of dark arts and ever darker influences. As the witches gather in the forest, their encounters with mystery, wonder, and horror reveal secrets kept by people they come to know, as well as the desires creeping within themselves.

  • For each story, you take on the perspective of one of the witches in the coven.
  • Uncover additional pieces of lore and secrets as you explore the story world.
  • A menu allows you to keep reference of your findings and your progress.
  • Each story stands on its own as a short-story experience. Stories can be played in any order.

itch.io: lilyounekeo.itch.io

Patreon: patreon.com/vvitchinghour

Official Site: vvitchinghour.com
